reviews.text: Good thing a walkway has been provided to properly link the C2C trains with the DLR. Step free access is available here and the DLR trains are quite frequent. Shelter, seating and ticket machines are provided on all platforms.

The rudest service you can ever receive is on c2c Limehouse station. The c2c train coordinators crowding usually at the end of eastbound platform entertaining each other rather than being spread over the whole platform ready to help their customers. If you dare to interrupt them you will be rewarded with nasty look and laconic information.
Sometimes they gathering at the ends of platform which is either not useful when the display board is out of order.
I do not see any point of these people being kept on this station.
Old fashioned but functional station. Used to be called Stepney East.
